text: The new five storied building constructed in St. Joseph Girl's School, Kegalle at a cost of Rs. 50 million, instead of the building that had damaged due to a landslide in several years ago, was declared open under the patronage of Minister of Enterprise Development Kabir Hashim and Minister of Power and Renewable Energy Ranjith Siyambalapitiya the other day.Member of the Sabaragamuwa Provincial Council Harsha Siyambalapitiya, Chairman of the Kegalle Divisional Coordinating Committee Lilan Amarakoon, Principal Mallika Ranasinghe and students participated in the event.
title: A new building for St. Joseph Girl's School, Kegalle
